sentences.sentence: Indy race is the best-known American automobile race and one of the most popular American sports events.
sentences.translation: 印地赛是美国最著名的汽车比赛，也是美国最受欢迎的体育赛事之一。

sentences.sentence: Can you imagine an Indy car driver playing musicin the background?
sentences.translation: 你能想象一辆印第安赛车手会在比赛时播放背景音乐吗？

sentences.sentence: After you finish watching the Indy 500 this Sunday, you may want to have your designated driver take you home.
sentences.translation: 当你看完这周5的indy500大奖赛后，你也许会希望你指派的司机送你回家。
